Access vBBU Operational Details through the Device Summary Window

Use this task to navigate to the vBBU Details window from the Device Summary window to view vBBU operational information.

  1. vBBU operational details can be indirectly accessed through the Device Summary window by doing the following:
    • Log into the PW EMS, this window displays by default.
    • From the navigation bar, click Dashboard.
    • From the navigation bar, click Devices > Device Summary.
  2. In the Device Summary window, select the vBBU row that you want to view.
  3. Click the Actions column button .
  4. In the pop-up menu that appears, click vBBU > Oper Details as shown below
    The vBBU Details window displays.
Refer to the View vBBU Details section for more information about parameters described in the vBBU Details window.
Parent topic: View Device Summary Information
